Title: Privilege escalation via stale admin role
Key Controls: JIT Access; 90-day admin review; CloudTrail alerts
Notes: Scope admin roles; remove unused; alert on elevation

Title: Public S3 bucket exposure
Key Controls: S3 Block Public Access; SCP deny public ACL; AWS Config rules

Title: Unpatched servers exploited
Key Controls: Automated patching; maintenance windows; vulnerability SLAs

Title: Secrets in source code
Key Controls: Pre-commit secret scan; repo policies; key rotation
Notes: Block on push + rotate found keys

Title: Excess data retention
Key Controls: Retention policy; S3 lifecycle; legal hold process

Title: Key mismanagement (KMS)
Key Controls: Key rotation; IAM boundaries; CMK ownership
